title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Scott and Mitchell dead in horror crane collapse?
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Hollyoaks fans have been left fearing the worst for some major characters after a crane collapsed onto the florist while the ground caved down into the tunnels below, trapping Nancy and Darren Osborne (Jessica Fox and Ashley Taylor Dawson).

Meanwhile, stuck in Breda McQueen’s (Myra Brady) crashed car, Tony Hutchinson (Nick Pickard) was just breaking free when he was buried in debris while Scott Drinkwell (Ross Adams) and Mitchell Deveraux (Imran Adams) were left in peril when the florist was crushed with them inside – but will anyone die as the dust settles and a rescue mission gets underway?

Breda’s crash into the digger was the trigger for the impact although Tom Cunningham (Ellis Hollins) has already torn a strip off of Cindy (Stephanie Waring) as she had been warned that the equipment had been too heavy for the unstable ground.

With the weight of the crane sinking into the brittle ground, apparatus such as piping and girders rained down on those below, almost killing Mandy Richardson (Sarah Jayne Dunn) and Yasmine Maalik (Haeisha Mistry). Well it wouldn’t be a Hollyoaks stunt if Yazz wasn’t in the firing line!

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

As Nancy and Darren searched for missing Charlie and Ella, the kids managed to get out but as the caves collapsed, te exits were sealed off and Mandy and Darren were left injured under the falling rubble.

Elsewhere, with Mitchell having refused to face the public by leaving the florist with Scott, the pair have been left staring death in the face. As members of the public including Mitchell’s girlfriend Cleo (Nadine Mulkerrin) rush to the scene after seeing that there were people inside, will it be too late to save them?

And will Tony be found before things get even worse for him? Charlie may well have spotted him in the back of the car – could it finally be time for Breda to be exposed?

And, down in the tunnels, will their shared peril unite Darren and Nancy as they fight for survival?
